title: october 9: malala’s story
description:
Malala was just 15 on the day that changed not only her life, but the course of history. On today’s episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia tells the compelling story of Malala’s journey surviving a shooting on her morning bus ride to school. Her story only begins there and Maia details all Malala’s triumphs since that day in 2012. In addition to this, Maia details one of Prince’s picture perfect moments when he opened for the Rolling Stones. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms. Distributed by Talkhouse. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
